analysis.description:
SaleWallet.doWithdraw (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#1290-1291) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- assert(bool)(multisig.send(this.balance)) (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#1290-1291)

Reentrancy in ESCBTokenSale.doPayment (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#1661-1685):
	External calls:
	- saleWallet.deposit(_owner,msg.value) (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#1674-1675)
	- assert(bool)(token.generateTokens(_owner,boughtTokens)) (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#1676-1677)
	External calls sending eth:
	- saleWallet.transfer(msg.value) (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#1671-1674)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalCollected (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#1678-1680)

MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#202) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#300-336)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#414-436)
	- generateTokens (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#507-522)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#529-544)
	- revokeTokenGrant (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#859-882)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#607-614) is declared view but contains assembly code

ESCBTokenSale.getPrice (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#1500-1505) is declared view but changes state variables:
	- ESCBTokenSale.currentStage

Reentrancy in ESCBTokenSale.allocationForESCBbyStage (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#1571-1599):
	External calls:
	- ESCBTokens = SafeMath.div(SafeMath.mul(SafeMath.sub(uint256(token.totalSupply()),usedTotalSupply),15),33) (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#1577-1579)
	- prevTotalSupply = uint256(token.totalSupply()) (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#1579-1582)
	- token.generateTokens(address(this),ESCBTokens) (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#1583-1599)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allocatedStage (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#1586)
	- usedTotalSupply (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#1586-1587)

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#347-366):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#362-363)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#364)

Reentrancy in MiniMeIrrVesDivToken.claimDividend (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#1104-1121):
	External calls:
	- balance = super.balanceOfAt(msg.sender,dividend.blockNumber) (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#1111-1112)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- dividends (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#1113-1114)
	- dividends (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#1114-1115)

	External calls:

	- require(bool)(tokenSale.saleFinalized()) (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#1295)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- currentState (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#1295-1296)

Reentrancy in ESCBTokenSale.setESCBCoin (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#1429-1482):
	External calls:
	- assert(bool)(token.controller() == address(this)) (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#1455-1456)
	- assert(bool)(token.totalSupply() == 0) (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#1457-1460)

	- assert(bool)(saleWallet.tokenSale() == address(this)) (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#1469-1470)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- activated (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#1482)

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#638-653) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_contracts/0x27a36731337cdee330d99b980b73e24f6e188618.sol#652-653)
